mean_en: the condition of being bankrupt :a condition of financial failure caused by not having the money that you need to pay your debts
word_etyma: bankrupt破产的 + cy名词后缀 → bankruptcy 破产
sentence: I'm facing bankruptcy and I will lose all my money and my house.
sentence_trans: 我濒临破产，我将失去我所有的钱还有房子。T-T~
